package.label: Digital Asset Management
package.desc: The Nuxeo DAM addon is a robust, extensible, Digital Asset Management solution that helps marketing and brand managers catalog, process, store, retrieve, and distribute rich media content, including images, audio, and video.

package.label: Drive
package.desc: The Nuxeo Drive addon enables the synchronization of folders from the Nuxeo Platform with local folder on your computer. It handles offline modification of files and deals with concurrent updates.

package.label: Nuxeo Diff
package.desc: The Nuxeo Diff addon enables to compare two documents or two versions of a document to see the differences between documents or versions, including metadata values comparaison, as well as office files.

package.label: Showcase Content
package.desc: Nuxeo Showcase Content import a set of showcase content so that the repository is not empty for your first steps: office documents, images, videos.

package.label: Spreadsheet
package.desc: The Nuxeo Spreadsheet addon allows bulk editing documents metadata starting from a content view result set, providing a spreadsheet-like user experience.

package.label: Template Rendering
package.desc: The Nuxeo Template Rendering addon is a set of plugins that provides a way to associate a Nuxeo Document with a Template that can be a Word document, an Excel sheet, an HTLM website. Template can reference metadata of the document. See the samples to undestand better.

package.label: Live Connect
package.desc: The Nuxeo Live Connect addon allows users to reference their files stored on most common EFSS systems (Dropbox, Box, Google Drive, One Drive). User can then apply business workflows to those external ressources as if they were documents stored in the Nuxeo repository.

package.label: Review Workflows Dashboards
package.desc: The Review Workflows Dashboard addon provides data visualization dashboards for Review Workflows.

package.label: Nuxeo Web UI - PREVIEW
package.desc: Try Nuxeo Web UI, the future of the user interface for Nuxeo Platform, finalised for next LTS.
